Title: Establishes the office of hospice and palliative care access and quality
Summary: Establishes the office of hospice and palliative care access and quality to provide expertise and input on hospice and palliative care policy development and regulation.
LawCode: Add ยง4003, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the office of hospice and palliative care access and quality
